body_html:
here we go again
I have created model successfully
and got optimized model too

Python works successfully too (when recognize test image)
python label_image.py
--graph=retrained_graph.pb
--labels=retrained_labels.txt
--image=hand2.jpg

I setup variables in android studio project:
private static final int INPUT_SIZE = 224;
private static final int IMAGE_MEAN = 117;
private static final float IMAGE_STD = 1f;

but when I run in Android, I have got this exception:
E/TensorFlowInferenceInterface: Failed to run TensorFlow inference with inputs:[Mul], outputs:[final_result]
W/System.err: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: computed output size would be negative

body:
here we go again
I have created model successfully
and got optimized model too

Python works successfully too (when recognize test image)
python label_image.py
 --graph=retrained_graph.pb
  --labels=retrained_labels.txt
  --image=hand2.jpg


I setup variables in android studio project:
    private static final int INPUT_SIZE = 224;
    private static final int IMAGE_MEAN = 117;
    private static final float IMAGE_STD = 1f;

but when I run in Android, I have got this exception:
E/TensorFlowInferenceInterface: Failed to run TensorFlow inference with inputs:[Mul], outputs:[final_result]
W/System.err: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: computed output size would be negative
